synopsis: All extreme dreams condense terribly unknown energy, causing distortions and turbulence in the real world. Ren Xiaochong, who escaped with his personality, was chosen to enter the dream world by coincidence. He became the dream warrior of the Dijon Pagoda, and he became a partner with the tower master Bai Yijun, the warlord daughter Ai Miu Miao and the writer Yan Yi. However, Chief Warrior Wu Jia has been arranging Ren Xiaochong because of misunderstandings in reality. At the same time as the contradictions between the two people have continued to intensify, the invasion plots of the external Mexican decisive towers have slowly spread.

title.en: Dream Tower - The Puzzle of Snow City
